title: Honor level lost
body: I had level 5 honor but somehow I have now level 2, at least it's showing on my profil. Don't know why, I tryed to re-logg in lot of times, hoping for just "bad loggin" but still honor 2. Don't know what to do or it's just visual bug and I have still level 5? :(

replies.body: same, i was honor lvl 4, same answer form riot, unable to to verify an honor level beyond 2. I guess it some kind of glitch, bug :/

I wasn't able to verify an honor level beyond 2 from the account you're posting on.  :(  No worries though,  reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further and see what happened.
